extension_description.message: Veb-sahifadagi tanlangan matnni tarjima qiling va belgilangan formatga aylantiring.

turn_off_description.message: Har safar matn tanlanganda Tarjima tugmasi ochiladi

turn_on_description.message: Matn tanlanganda Tarjima tugmasi ko‘rinmaydi, lekin siz hali ham asboblar panelidagi Pro Translate belgisini bosish orqali tarjima qilishingiz mumkin.

auto_switch.message: Avtomatik ravishda ikkinchi maqsadli tilga o'ting

auto_switch_description.message: Tanlangan matn standart maqsadli til bo'lsa, uni ikkinchi maqsadli tilga tarjima qiling

target_format_description.message: Standart maqsad formatini tanlang, format tarjima panelida o'zgartirilishi mumkin

auto_set_format_description.message: Tarjima panelida formatni o'zgartirganda, tanlangan formatni standart formatga o'rnating

format_and_order_description.message: Tarjima paneli va ko'rsatish tartibida o'zgarishi mumkin bo'lgan holatlarni formatlash

translate_button_on_description.message: Har safar matn tanlanganda Tarjima tugmasi ochiladi

translate_button_off_description.message: Matn tanlanganda Tarjima tugmasi ko‘rinmaydi, lekin siz hali ham asboblar panelidagi Pro Translate belgisini bosish orqali tarjima qilishingiz mumkin.
